alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:18PM CDT until September 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Morris County in east central Kansas... West central Lyon County in east central Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Strong City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Council Grove, Americus and Dunlap. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
